rules.natural: If the company develops the drug, the drug treats the disease.
In the event that a gene is discovered, it is not the case that the gene is linked to the disease.
Either a gene is discovered, or under the condition that the company uses computer modeling, the company is not controversial.
Whenever the researcher hires an expert, the company does not develop the drug.
Provided that the researcher collaborates with the university, then the company does not develop the drug.
Whenever the researcher receives a grant, the researcher hires an expert.
Under the condition that the researcher partners with the company, the researcher collaborates with the university.
If the researcher secures funding, then either the researcher receives a grant or the researcher partners with the company.
Either the scientist makes a breakthrough, or the scientist receives an award.
Under the condition that the scientist receives an award, the scientist does not lose their job.
If the company develops new technology, then the scientist does not get a promotion.
The company acquires a patent or the company develops new technology.
Whenever the drug is approved by the FDA, the drug fails the clinical trial.
Under the condition that the company uses animal testing, the company is controversial.
Either the company uses animal testing, or if the drug treats the disease, then the drug is effective against the disease.
Provided that the company adopts alternative methods, then the company is not controversial.
Either the company adopts alternative methods, or the company uses computer modeling.
Provided that it is not the case that if the company develops the drug, then the drug is effective against the disease, then the drug is approved by the FDA.
Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a gene is discovered, the gene is linked to the disease, then the researcher publishes findings.
If it is not the case that provided that the scientist makes a breakthrough, then the scientist does not lose their job, then the scientist gets a promotion.
If the researcher does not secure funding, then the scientist loses their job.
Provided that the company is not profitable, then the company develops the drug.

(A1 → A2).natural: Provided that the company develops the drug, then the drug is effective against the disease.

(A1 → A5).natural: If the company develops the drug, the drug treats the disease.

(A10 → A11).natural: Whenever a gene is discovered, that gene is linked to the disease.

(A10 → ¬A11).natural: In the event that a gene is discovered, it is not the case that the gene is linked to the disease.

(A10 ∨ (A9 → ¬A7)).natural: Either a gene is discovered, or under the condition that the company uses computer modeling, the company is not controversial.

(A13 → ¬A1).natural: Whenever the researcher hires an expert, the company does not develop the drug.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: The researcher hires an expert or the researcher collaborates with the university.

(A14 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that the researcher collaborates with the university, then the company does not develop the drug.

(A15 → A13).natural: Whenever the researcher receives a grant, the researcher hires an expert.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either the researcher receives a grant, or the researcher partners with the company.

(A16 → A14).natural: Under the condition that the researcher partners with the company, the researcher collaborates with the university.

(A17 → (A15 ∨ A16)).natural: If the researcher secures funding, then either the researcher receives a grant or the researcher partners with the company.

(A19 → ¬A18).natural: Provided that the scientist makes a breakthrough, then the scientist does not lose their job.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: Either the scientist makes a breakthrough, or the scientist receives an award.

(A20 → ¬A18).natural: Under the condition that the scientist receives an award, the scientist does not lose their job.

(A22 → ¬A21).natural: If the company develops new technology, then the scientist does not get a promotion.

(A23 ∨ A22).natural: The company acquires a patent or the company develops new technology.

(A4 → A3).natural: Whenever the drug is approved by the FDA, the drug fails the clinical trial.

(A5 → A2).natural: Provided that the drug treats the disease, then the drug is effective against the disease.

(A6 → A7).natural: Under the condition that the company uses animal testing, the company is controversial.

(A6 ∨ (A5 → A2)).natural: Either the company uses animal testing, or if the drug treats the disease, then the drug is effective against the disease.

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: Provided that the company adopts alternative methods, then the company is not controversial.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the company adopts alternative methods, or the company uses computer modeling.

(A9 → ¬A7).natural: Under the condition that the company uses computer modeling, the company is not controversial.

(¬(A1 → A2) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the company develops the drug, the drug is effective against the disease, then the drug fails the clinical trial.

(¬(A1 → A2) → A4).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the company develops the drug, then the drug is effective against the disease, then the drug is approved by the FDA.
